### M4000-235428 Request for Standing Offer for Detention Guard Services - Atlantic Region
#### Solicitation Number: WS4104488273
#### Publication Date: February 1, 2024
#### Tender Closing Date: April 9, 2024 2:00 PM EST

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking to establish a standing offer for Detention Guard Services in the Atlantic Region. The purpose of this tender is to provide security services to support the RCMP in the delivery of its Federal Policing Program.

**Scope of Work:**
The RCMP requires the services of Detention Guards on an as-needed basis to support duties related to the safety and well-being of individuals incarcerated in RCMP Detention cells throughout the Atlantic Region. This includes providing supervision and support services to inmates in RCMP Detention cells in New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, Newfoundland and Labrador, and Prince Edward Island.

**Solicitation Information:**

*   Solicitation Number: WS4104488273
*   Publication Date: February 1, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: April 9, 2024 2:00 PM EST
*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contact Information:
    *   Broker: Ariba Discovery
    *   Reference Number: WS4104488273-Doc4424820361

** Bid Requirements:**

*   Bidders must be a qualified supplier of Detention Guard Services
*   Bidders must submit a standalone bid in response to this solicitation
*   All bidder documents must be provided in Adobe Acrobat (PDF) format

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The bid will be evaluated on the basis of the lowest price submitted by the bidder.

**Award Decision:**
The contract will be awarded to the bidder who submits the lowest price that meets all the requirements of the solicitation.

Please refer to the solicitation document for more information.
